title: Stripe App manifest
description: A manifest describing a Stripe App.

id.description: The unique identifier for an app, for example "com.invoicing.myapp".
id.markdownDescription: The unique identifier for an app, for example `com.invoicing.myapp`.

version.description: An app version that you define. You can use any format you want for version identifiers.

name.description: The name shown in the UI when referring to your app.

icon.description: The relative path to a 300x300 pixel PNG image, for example "./icon.png".
icon.markdownDescription: The relative path to a 300x300 pixel PNG image, for example `./icon.png`.

permissions.description: The permissions available to the app. Read more about permissions: https://stripe.com/docs/stripe-apps/reference/permissions
permissions.markdownDescription: The permissions available to the app. [Read more about permissions](https://stripe.com/docs/stripe-apps/reference/permissions).

permission.description: The ID of the permission. Read more about permissions: https://stripe.com/docs/stripe-apps/reference/permissions
permission.markdownDescription: The ID of the permission. [Read more about permissions](https://stripe.com/docs/stripe-apps/reference/permissions).

purpose.description: The reason for requesting the permission.

app_backend.description: Configuration options related to the app backend.

webhooks.description: Configure user events to be sent to an external URL.

url.description: The URL to send the events to.

enabled_events.description: The events that we send to the webhook.

post_install_action.description: Specify a recommended action for users to take after installing your app. Read more about post-install actions: https://stripe.com/docs/stripe-apps/post-install-actions
post_install_action.markdownDescription: Specify a recommended action users should take after installing your app. [Read more about post-install actions](https://stripe.com/docs/stripe-apps/post-install-actions).

url.description: External URL to redirect users to after installing your app.

ui_extension.description: Configuration options for how to display the app in the Dashboard.

views.description: Configure where the app appears in the Dashboard.

viewport.description: An identifier that indicates where a UI extension appears in the Dashboard. Read more about viewports: https://stripe.com/docs/stripe-apps/reference/viewports
viewport.markdownDescription: An identifier that indicates where a UI extension appears in the Dashboard. [Read more about viewports](https://stripe.com/docs/stripe-apps/reference/viewports).

component.description: The name of the React component in the "src/views" directory to render.
component.markdownDescription: The name of the React component in the `src/views` directory to render.

content_security_policy.description: Configure the content security policy for your app.

connect-src.description: URLs of permitted third-party APIs. If the URL ends in a slash, all of its children also receive permission. Read about using third-party APIs: https://stripe.com/docs/stripe-apps/build-ui#use-third-party-apis
connect-src.markdownDescription: URLs of permitted third-party APIs. If the URL ends in a slash, all of its children also receive permission. [Read about using third-party APIs](https://stripe.com/docs/stripe-apps/build-ui#use-third-party-apis).

image-src.description: URLs the Img component (https://stripe.com/stripe-apps/ui-toolkit/components/img) can load from. If the URL ends in a slash, all trailing paths are also permitted.
image-src.markdownDescription: URLs the [Img component](https://stripe.com/stripe-apps/ui-toolkit/components/img) can load from. If the URL ends in a slash, all trailing paths are also permitted.

purpose.description: A message to show users when the app is installed that explains why the app needs to communicate with external URLs.

postInstallActionType.description: The recommended action for users to take after installing your app. Read about post-install actions: https://stripe.com/docs/stripe-apps/post-install-actions
postInstallActionType.markdownDescription: The recommended action for users to take after installing your app. [Read about post-install actions](https://stripe.com/docs/stripe-apps/post-install-actions).
